title: 'Inconsistent' Scores Mar Annual Cyber Report Card, GAO Says
text:
30 'Inconsistent' Scores Mar Annual Cyber Report Card, GAO Says 
Nextgov: Federal agencies across the board are still struggling to prevent and detect inappropriate access to computer networks and to implement agencywide security management programs.And because of fuzzy guidance from the White House, inspectors general -- who are supposed to annually double check that agencies actually comply with federal cybersecurity laws -- are inconsistently reporting their agencyâ€™s overall security performance.
